codify:replace.doc: Stockbridge-Munsee Council Bylaws for Cultural Affairs Committee
codify:replace.codified:doc: Stockbridge-Munsee Council Bylaws for Cultural Affairs Committee

para.text: If a Member has a conflict of interest, and the issue involving the conflict is an agenda item during a Committee meeting, that Member shall recuse themselves from that item item (See, ADM.01.16 or other applicable law).
